title: EWL Track Work - Bedok–Tampines and Tanah Merah–Expo

title_translations.zh-Hans: EWL 轨道工程 - 丹那美拉与四美（百多–淡滨尼及丹那美拉–博览馆区间）
title_translations.ms: Kerja Trek EWL - Tanah Merah & Simei (bahagian Bedok–Tampines dan Tanah Merah–Expo)
title_translations.ta: EWL பாதை பணிகள் - தானா மேரா & சிமெய் (பெடோக்–டம்பைன்ஸ் மற்றும் தானா மேரா–எக்ஸ்போ பிரிவுகள்)

updates.text: Some passengers were relieved that they could return to taking their original MRT routes.

East West Line (EWL) service on the Bedok–Tampines and Tanah Merah–Expo sections will resume ahead of schedule on 8 December, indicating a partial disruption on those segments is ending earlier than planned.
This follows the completion of track works and comprehensive testing.

From 29 November to 8 December 2025, East-West Line's Simei and Tanah Merah stations will be closed. There will be no train service on the East-West Line between Bedok and Tampines stations, and Tanah Merah and Expo stations. Please use alternative MRT lines and bus services.
LTA estimates 180,000 passengers could be affected daily over the 10 days of service adjustments.
Shuttle buses will run between the affected stations during the closures, which are expected to impact about 180,000 commuters.
